texts: My name is Hannes. My whole life I've been engaged in IT. When I was 10 years old my dad showed me my first programming language, Visual Basic. Since then i was hooked.

I'm 22 years old today and my passion for IT has only grown over the years. Over the years I have worked on many projects, infact this Website was one of them. You can find my projects by clicking the three bars at the top or the links on the slideshow above.
During my time in school, university and in companies I learned a lot of skills in various parts of the IT field. Here a little list of some of them:
